languages.text: "Правда? Тогда почему здесь на каждой консервной банке, шестерне и клочке ткани герб нашего Дома? Не прикидывайся слепой!"

traits.locale_text: "Правда? Тогда почему здесь на каждой консервной банке, шестерне и клочке ткани герб нашего Дома? Не прикидывайся слепой!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"
languages.original_text: "Правда? Тогда почему здесь на каждой консервной банке, шестерне и клочке ткани герб нашего Дома? Не прикидывайся слепой!"

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Stop playing blind!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Stop playing blind!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Stop playing blind!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Stop playing blind!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「そうかな？では、なぜこの場所の金属片や布切れれにはオーセリオ家の紋章が入っているのだ？目を覚ますんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうかな？では、なぜこの場所の金属片や布切れれにはオーセリオ家の紋章が入っているのだ？目を覚ますんだ！」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “真的是这样吗？那为什么这里的每块金属、每件织物，都有我们家族的纹章？睁开眼睛，好好看看吧！”
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: “真的是这样吗？那为什么这里的每块金属、每件织物，都有我们家族的纹章？别再自欺欺人了！”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, pourquoi l'emblème de notre maison est-il gravé sur chaque bout de métal ou de tissu ici ? Cessez donc de vous voiler la face ! »
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Dans ce cas, pourquoi l'emblème de notre maison est-il gravé sur chaque bout de métal ou de tissu ici ? Cessez donc de vous voiler la face ! »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «¿Es eso cierto? Entonces, ¿por qué cada trozo de metal y tela de este lugar presenta el escudo de nuestra casa? ¡Abra los ojos!».
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es eso cierto? Entonces, ¿por qué cada trozo de metal y tela de este lugar presenta el escudo de nuestra casa? ¡No haga como que no lo ve!».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Ist dem so? Warum trägt dann jedes Stück Metall oder Stoff hier das Wappen unseres Hauses? Öffnet Eure Augen!"
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: "Ist dem so? Warum trägt dann jedes Stück Metall oder Stoff hier das Wappen unseres Hauses? Hört auf, Euch blind zu stellen!"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Öyle mi dersin? O hâlde neden buradaki her bir metal veya kumaş parçası, Hanemizin armasını taşıyor? Uyan!"
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Then why is it that every piece of metal or fabric in this place bears our House's coat of arms? Open your eyes!"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi dersin? O hâlde neden buradaki her bir metal veya kumaş parçası, Hanemizin armasını taşıyor?"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
